name: Alabaster Tiger
description: With a flourish of sleeves and sword's dance divine, who can fathom the depths of this heart o' mine?

weaponEffects.title: Frost Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase frost ATK by **15%** and frost resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

weaponEffects.title: Extreme Cold: Unload
weaponEffects.description: After using **Sword Art: Shadowy Ice**, every second, deal damage equal to **70%** of frost ATK plus **10%** of the Wanderer's Max HP plus **36%** of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus **135%** of crit for **3000** seconds. Multiple Unload damage will not stack and Extreme Cold damage will be counted as skill damage. If there is **1** volt/flame/physical weapon of any kind equipped, Extreme Cold damage is multiplied by **130** times. In addition, Extreme Cold damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

normals.name: Sword Art: Mooncutter
normals.description:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch **6** attacks in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **97.8%** of ATK plus **587** and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **129.4%** of ATK plus **776** and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **207.2%** of ATK plus **1243** and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **125%** of ATK plus **750** and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **226%** of ATK plus **1356** and draw in enemies to the front of the Wanderer.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to **253.6%** of ATK plus **1521** and launch the target.
After triggering Sword Art: Mooncutter, tap and hold normal attack to trigger **Sword Art: Endless Snow**.

After any of **Alabaster Tiger's** normal attacks land a hit, apply **1** stack of **Crystalline Crack** to the target, dealing normal attack damage equal to **48%** of ATK every second for **15** seconds. Only **1** stack of Crystalline Crack can be applied to the same target every **4** seconds, stacking up to **3** times. The stacks will disappear one by one after the effect duration is over.

normals.name: Sword Art: Plum Swordcry
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch **6** consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **95.9%** of ATK plus **575**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **100.7%** of ATK plus **604**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **218.6%** of ATK plus **1311**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **130%** of ATK plus **780**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **213.7%** of ATK plus **1282**.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to **256.9%** of ATK plus **1541**.

normals.name: Sword Art: Endless Snow
normals.description:
While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Sword Art: Endless Snow.
Use mind control to manipulate the sword while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to **140.8%** of ATK plus **845** to nearby targets.
When Sword Art: Endless Snow ends, release a powerful sword aura, dealing damage equal to **422.4%** of ATK plus **2534** to nearby targets.

normals.name: Sword Art: Falling Frost
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Sword Art: Falling Frost.
While falling, deal damage equal to **75%** of ATK plus **450** each time the target is hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **366.7%** of ATK plus **2200** to nearby targets.

normals.name: Light Steps
normals.description:
While the Wanderer is airborne after double jumping, tap jump to trigger Light Steps. Briefly dash upward before continuously gliding. While airborne, Light Steps can be used up to **2** times.
While on the ground, Light Steps recovers **1** use attempt every **10** seconds (switching areas, switching weapons, or unequipping **Alabaster Tiger** will reset the use attempts).

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

dodge.name: Sword Art: Cloud Shower
dodge.description: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Sword Art: Cloud Shower, dealing damage up to **305%** of ATK plus **1830** to targets hit.

dodge.name: Sword Art: Mortal Soul
dodge.description: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Sword Art: Mortal Soul. Release a White Tiger illusion to deal damage equal to **174.3%** of ATK plus **1046** to targets ahead.

skill.name: Sword Art: Shadowy Ice
skill.description:
Deal damage equal to **370.2%** of ATK plus **2221** to nearby targets and draw them in. Then, form a Sword Array to summon a heavy rain of swords and **strongly freeze** targets (unavailable in Apex League and against bosses) for **4** seconds. Cooldown: **30** seconds.
After successfully using Sword Art: Shadowy Ice, the Wanderer emits **Cold Air**, dealing damage equal to **68%** of ATK to nearby targets every second, and also reducing the targets' speed by **30%** (unavailable in Apex League and against bosses).
After completely executing Sword Art: Shadowy Ice, the Wanderer creates the maximum amount of **Frost Blades**, firing **1** blade every **7.5** seconds at the currently locked-on target, dealing damage equal to **360%** of ATK and inflicting **Temperature Reduction** on the target. There can be up to **3** **Frost Blades** created initially, and all blades will be removed while in the non-combat state.
**Temperature Reduction**: Deal damage equal to **240%** of ATK every **3** seconds to nearby targets for **12** seconds.

discharge.name: Sword Art: Icy Beckon
discharge.description:
When **weapon charge is full** or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and summon a Sword Array around the Wanderer, engulfing the area in cold and dealing damage up to **844.5%** of ATK plus **5067** to nearby targets. Soon after, summon a White Tiger to deal damage equal to **1971%** of ATK plus **11825**, during which damage immunity lasts for **1.5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
**Passive**: After Sword Art: Icy Beckon lands a hit, increase final damage by **8%** for **30** seconds.

advancements.description: After launching **Frost Blades**, the Wanderer's frost ATK is increased by **0.1%** and nearby targets will be dealt damage equal to **80%** of ATK every second for **30** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

The Wanderer can produce up to **4** **Frost Blades** and **Temperature Reduction's** damage's base multiplier is increased to **360%**.
If the target is the only one affected by **Temperature Reduction** within **600** seconds, additionally apply **Vein Seal** to the target, reducing their speed by **30%** (unavailable in Apex League and against bosses). If the target receives **Frost Blade** damage again during **Vein Seal's** duration, trigger Icy Burst, dealing skill damage equal to **1700%** of ATK plus **2%** of the target's already-lost HP at that point (Icy Burst damage will be no lower than **2000%** of the Wanderer's frost ATK and no higher than **2200%** of the Wanderer's frost ATK). Then, remove the **Vein Seal** and **Temperature Reduction** effects on the target.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

The damage dealt by **Crystalline Crack** and **Cold Air** is additionally increased by **50%**. **Light Steps'** use attempts is increased to **10** and recovery rate is increased to **1** attempt every **3** seconds.
The **Temperature Reduction** effect inflicted after firing **Frost Blades** is now applied to an area and also deals additional damage equal to **990%** of ATK to nearby targets.
